name: Actual 3D Sudoku
description:
The "3D" sudokus that already existed were just normal 2D sudokus that didn't interact with each other, so I had to make one.

This game is completely free but if you feel the need, donations are appreciated. My paypal email is: dospuntosuveequisde90@gmail.com

I need some help to set special 3D sudokus. So far the game supports arrows, between lines, palindrome lines and german whispers.

If you'd like to help me set these 3D sudokus, contact me at aaronf.bianchi@gmail.com or at discord: Jup#7140 to give you the instructions to see your sets in the game.

I plan to add more special sudoku mechanics like little killer sums, skyscrapers, diagonals, X & V sums and killer 3D cages.

The normal 3D sudoku sets were generated by Vegard Hanssen.
